bibl.title: Power of Attorney, Mary Morris to Thomas H. White., 1807 June 17
bibl.note: Insurance Company of North America Records, 1792 December 1-1843 February 18

projectDesc.p: Machine-readable transcription created for the University of Tennessee Libraries Special Collections.

editorialDecl.p: Errors in transcription of the printed text not controlled.
Editorial tags limited to gap and unclear.
Catchwords and directional notes such as "turn page over" have been omitted.

revisionDesc.change: Approximate date of original transcription and transcriber.
Migrating from P4 to validated TEI P5.

div.p: Printed and Sold by JAMES HUMPHREYS, at the Corner of Second &Walnut-Streets.
Know all Men, by these Presents, That
have nominated, constituted, authorised, and appointed, and do hereby nominate, constitute, authorise, and appoint Thos H White

of the City of Philadelphia, to be my true and lawful Attorney for me and in my Name to sell whatever Shares are in my name or may be in my Name on the books of the N America Insurance Company. &also to receive whatever dividend may be declared on the same

Giving and hereby granting to him said Attorney my full and whole power and authority in the Premises, with power also for him to appoint one or more Substitutes under for all or either of the purposes aforesaid. In Witness whereof I have hereunto fet my Hand and Seal this 17th Day of June One thousand eight hundred and Seven.
